Name: Aegis
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members within earshot (5...10...11 seconds). 50% chance to block.

Name: Aegis (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...3...3 seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail. Cannot self-target.

Name: Air of Enchantment
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) Enchantments cast on target ally cost 5 less Energy (minimum 1 Energy). Cannot self-target.

Name: Amity
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Foes adjacent to you cannot attack. Ends on any foes that take damage.

Name: Aura of Faith
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3 seconds.) Target ally gains 50...90...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...41...50% less damage.

Name: Aura of Stability
Description: Enchantment Spell. (3...7...8 seconds.) Target ally cannot be knocked-down. Cannot self-target.

Name: Balthazar's Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Deals 10...22...25 holy damage each second to foes adjacent to target ally.

Name: Balthazar's Pendulum
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Causes knock-down to the next foe attempting to knock-down target ally.

Name: Balthazar's Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally gains adrenaline and 1 Energy when taking damage.

Name: Bane Signet
Description: Signet. Deals 26...50...56 holy damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

Name: Banish
Description: Spell. Deals 20...49...56 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Name: Blessed Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. Monk enchantments you cast last 10...30...35% longer.

Name: Blessed Light
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 10...114...140. Removes one condition and one hex.

Name: Blessed Signet
Description: Signet. You gain 3 Energy for each enchantment you are maintaining. You cannot gain more than 3...20...24 Energy in this way.

Name: Boon Signet
Description: Elite Signet. Heals for 20...68...80. Your next Healing or Protection Prayer spell that targets an ally heals for +20...68...80 Health.

Name: Castigation Signet
Description: Signet. Deals 26...50...56 holy damage. You gain 1...8...10 Energy if target foe is attacking.

Name: Contemplation of Purity
Description: Skill. You gain 0...64...80 Health and lose one hex and one condition for each enchantment on you (maximum 1...7...8 hexes and conditions). You lose all enchantments.

Name: Convert Hexes
Description: Spell. Removes all hexes; +10 armor for each Necromancer hex removed (8...18...20 seconds). Cannot self-target.

Name: Cure Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a Hex. Removal effect: Heals for 30...102...120.

Name: Defender's Zeal
Description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...21...25 seconds.) You gain 2 Energy whenever target foe hits with an attack.

Name: Deny Hexes
Description: Spell. Removes one hex from target ally and one additional hex for each recharging Divine Favor skill you have.

Name: Dismiss Condition
Description: Spell. Removes one condition. Heals for 15...63...75 if target ally is enchanted.

Name: Divert Hexes
Description: Elite Spell. Removes 1...3...3 hex[es]. For each hex removed target ally loses one condition and gains 15...63...75 Health.

Name: Divine Boon
Description: Enchantment Spell. Whenever you cast a Protection Prayer or Divine Favor spell on an ally that ally is healed for 15...51...60. Heal cost: you lose 1 Energy.

Name: Divine Healing
Description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60.

Name: Divine Intervention
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage target ally takes. Negation effect: heals for 26...197...240.

Name: Divine Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...11...14 second[s].) Monk spells cost you 5 less Energy. Minimum cost: 1 Energy.

Name: Draw Conditions
Description: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. Transfer effect: you gain 6...22...26 Health for each condition. Cannot self-target.

Name: Dwayna's Kiss
Description: Spell. Heals for 15...51...60. Heals for 10...30...35 more for each enchantment and hex on target ally. Cannot self-target.

Name: Dwayna's Sorrow
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants allies near your target (30 seconds). Your party is healed for 5...41...50 whenever one of these allies dies.

Name: Empathic Removal
Description: Elite Spell. Removes one condition and hex from target ally and yourself and heals for 50. Cannot self-target.

Name: Essence Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. You gain 1 Energy whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage.

Name: Ethereal Light
Description: Spell. Heals for 25...85...100. Easily interrupted.

Name: Extinguish
Description: Spell. Affects all party members. Removes one condition. Party members relieved of Burning are healed for 10...82...100.

Name: Gift of Health
Description: Spell. Heals for 15...123...150. Disables your other Healing Prayers skills (10...6...5 seconds). Cannot self-target.

Name: Glimmer of Light
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 10...94...115.

Name: Guardian
Description: Enchantment Spell. (2...6...7 seconds.) 50% chance to block.

Name: Heal Area
Description: Spell. Heals you and adjacent allies and foes for 30...150...180.

Name: Heal Other
Description: Spell. Heals for 35...151...180. Cannot self-target.

Name: Heal Party
Description: Spell. Heals entire party for 30...66...75.

Name: Heal Party (PvP)
Description: Spell. Heals entire party for 30...66...75.

Name: Healer's Boon
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...46...55 seconds.) Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster and heal for 50% more.

Name: Healer's Covenant
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Your Healing Prayers spells cost 1...3...3 less Energy. These spells heal for 25% less.

Name: Healing Breeze
Description: Enchantment Spell. (15 seconds.) +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

Name: Healing Burst
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 10...130...160. Party members in earshot of your target gain Health equal to the Divine Favor bonus. Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).

Name: Healing Hands
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Heals for 5...29...35 whenever target takes damage.

Name: Healing Light
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 40...88...100. You gain 1...3...3 Energy if target ally is enchanted.

Name: Healing Ribbon
Description: Spell. Heals for 20...92...110. Heals two additional allies near target ally for 10...82...100. Cannot self-target.

Name: Healing Ring
Description: Spell. Heals adjacent allies and foes for 30...150...180. The caster is not healed.

Name: Healing Seed
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target and adjacent allies gain 3...25...30 Health whenever this ally takes damage. Cannot self-target.

Name: Healing Touch
Description: Touch Spell. Heals for 16...51...60. Double Health gain from Divine Favor for this spell.

Name: Healing Whisper
Description: Half Range Spell. Heals for 40...88...100. Cannot self-target.

Name: Heaven's Delight
Description: Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.

Name: Holy Haste
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...48...60 second[s].) Your Healing Prayers spells cast 50% faster. Ends if you cast an enchantment.

Name: Holy Strike
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 10...46...55 holy damage. Deals 10...46...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

Name: Holy Veil
Description: Enchantment Spell. Doubles casting time of hexes cast on target ally. End effect: removes a hex.

Name: Holy Wrath
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10...26...30 seconds). Deals 66% of each attack's damage (maximum 5...41...50) back to source. Ends after dealing damage 1...8...10 time[s]. Cannot self-target.

Name: Infuse Health
Description: Spell. Heals for 100...129...136% of half your current Health. Lose half your current Health. Cannot self-target.

Name: Jamei's Gaze
Description: Spell. Heals for 35...151...180. Cannot self-target.

Name: Judge's Insight
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Converts target ally's attacks to holy damage and adds +20% armor penetration.

Name: Judge's Intervention
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage. Negation effect: deals 30...150...180 holy damage to one foe near target ally.

Name: Judgment Strike
Description: Elite Melee Attack. Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13...27...30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes. PvE Skill.

Name: Karei's Healing Circle
Description: Spell. Heals you for 30...150...180. Also heals adjacent creatures.

Name: Kirin's Wrath
Description: Spell. Deals 8...27...32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Name: Life Attunement
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally gains 14...43...50% more Health when healed. This ally deals 30% less damage with attacks.

Name: Life Barrier
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Reduces damage by 20...44...50%. Cannot self-target. If your Health is below 50% when target takes damage Life Barrier ends.

Name: Life Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. Half of the damage target ally takes from attacks is redirected to you. Redirected damage is reduced by 3...25...30. Cannot self-target.

Name: Life Sheath
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 20...84...100) to healing. Initial effect: Removes 0...2...2 condition[s].

Name: Light of Deliverance
Description: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...57...70.

Name: Light of Deliverance (PvP)
Description: Elite Spell. Heals entire party for 5...57...70. Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).

Name: Light of Dwayna
Description: Spell. Resurrects all dead party members in the area. (25% Health zero Energy).

Name: Live Vicariously
Description: Enchantment Spell. You gain 2...14...17 Health whenever target ally hits a foe.

Name: Mark of Protection
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Converts incoming damage to healing (maximum 6...49...60). All your Protection Prayers are disabled (5 seconds).

Name: Martyr
Description: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions from all allies to you.

Name: Mend Ailment
Description: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...57...70 for each remaining condition.

Name: Mend Condition
Description: Spell. Removes one condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...57...70. Cannot self-target.

Name: Mending
Description: Enchantment Spell. +1...3...4 Health regeneration.

Name: Mending Touch
Description: Touch Spell. Removes two conditions. Heals for 15...51...60 for each condition removed.

Name: Orison of Healing
Description: Spell. Heals for 20...60...70.

Name: Pacifism
Description: Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Target foe cannot attack. Ends if this foe takes damage.

Name: Patient Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (2 seconds.) End effect: heals for 30...102...120. No effect if ends early.

Name: Peace and Harmony
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Target ally loses 0...7...9 condition[s] and hex[es]. Conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally (1...3...3 second[s]). Disables your Smiting Prayers (20 seconds).

Name: Pensive Guardian
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...10...11 seconds.) 50% chance to block enchanted foes.

Name: Protective Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally cannot lose more than 5% max Health from a single attack or spell. Each time damage is reduced you lose 6...4...3 Energy or this spell ends.

Name: Protective Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...19...23 seconds.) Incoming damage is reduced to 10% of target ally's maximum Health.

Name: Purge Conditions
Description: Spell. Removes all conditions.

Name: Purge Signet
Description: Signet. Removes all hexes and conditions. Removal cost: 10 Energy each.

Name: Purifying Veil
Description: Enchantment Spell. Conditions expire 5...41...50% faster on target ally. End effect: removes a condition.

Name: Ray of Judgment
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 5...37...45 holy damage and inflicts Burning (1...3...3 second[s]) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.

Name: Rebirth
Description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health 0 Energy). Teleports target to you. Disables target's skills (10...4...3 seconds). You lose all Energy.

Name: Release Enchantments
Description: Spell. Removes all of your enchantments. Heals all party members for 5...29...35 for each Monk Enchantment removed.

Name: Remove Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally.

Name: Renew Life
Description: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (50% Health and 5...17...20% Energy). Heals allies within earshot for 55...115...130.

Name: Restful Breeze
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8...16...18 seconds.) +10 Health regeneration. Ends if target ally attacks or uses a skill.

Name: Restore Condition
Description: Elite Spell. Removes all conditions. Removal effect: heals for 10...58...70 for each condition removed. Cannot self-target.

Name: Restore Life
Description: Touch Spell. Resurrects target party member (20...56...65% Health 42...80...90% Energy).

Name: Resurrect
Description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health 0 Energy).

Name: Resurrection Chant
Description: Half Range Spell. Resurrects target party member at your current Health and with 5...29...35% Energy.

Name: Retribution
Description: Enchantment Spell. Deals 33% of each attack's damage (maximum 5...17...20) back to the source.

Name: Reversal of Damage
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Negates the next damage and hits the source for that same amount (maximum 5...61...75).

Name: Reversal of Fortune
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 15...67...80) to healing.

Name: Reverse Hex
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...9...10 seconds.) Removes one hex from target ally. The next damage this ally takes is reduced by 5...41...50. No effect unless this ally is hexed.

Name: Scourge Enchantment
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Deals 15...63...75 damage to anyone casting an enchantment on target foe.

Name: Scourge Healing
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Whenever target foe is healed the healer takes 15...67...80 holy damage.

Name: Scourge Sacrifice
Description: Hex Spell. Also hexes foes adjacent to target (8...18...20 seconds). Doubles Health sacrifice.

Name: Scribe's Insight
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) You gain 3 Energy whenever you use a signet.

Name: Seed of Life
Description: Enchantment Spell. (2...5) seconds. Heals party members for 2 for each rank in Divine Favor whenever target takes damage. Cannot self target.

Name: Selfless Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (15...20 seconds.) Spells you cast that target another ally cost 3 less Energy.

Name: Shield Guardian
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...3...4 second[s]). Party members in earshot have a 75% chance to block attacks. Block effect: Allies in earshot are healed for 10...34...40 and Shield Guardian ends.

Name: Shield of Absorption
Description: Enchantment Spell. (3...6...7 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage by 5 each time target ally takes damage.

Name: Shield of Deflection
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...9...10 seconds.) 75% chance to block. +15...27...30 armor.

Name: Shield of Judgment
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Deals 5...41...50 holy damage to foes attacking target ally. Causes knock-down.

Name: Shield of Regeneration
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...11...13 seconds.) +3...9...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor.

Name: Shielding Hands
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage and life steal by 3...15...18. End effect: heals for 5...41...50

Name: Signet of Devotion
Description: Signet. Heals for 14...83...100.

Name: Signet of Judgment
Description: Elite Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 15...63...75 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

Name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
Description: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 5...41...50 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

Name: Signet of Mystic Wrath
Description: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 holy damage for each enchantment on you (maximum 100 holy damage).

Name: Signet of Rage
Description: Signet. Deals 5...41...50 holy damage. Deals 5...9...10 more holy damage for each of target foe's adrenaline skills.

Name: Signet of Rejuvenation
Description: Signet. Heals for 15...63...75. Heals for 15...63...75 more if target ally is casting a spell or attacking.

Name: Signet of Removal
Description: Elite Signet. Removes one hex and one condition. No effect unless target ally is enchanted.

Name: Smite
Description: Spell. Deals 10...46...55 holy damage. Deals 10...30...35 more holy damage if target is attacking.

Name: Smite Condition
Description: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: deals 10...50...60 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

Name: Smite Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 10...70...85 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

Name: Smiter's Boon
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

Name: Smiter's Boon (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5 seconds.) Your Smiting Prayers have double Divine Favor healing bonus.

Name: Spear of Light
Description: Spell. Projectile: deals 26...50...56 holy damage. Deals 15...51...60 more damage if target foe is attacking.

Name: Spell Breaker
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...15...17 seconds.) Target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

Name: Spell Shield
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) While casting spells you cannot be the target of spells. End effect: your skills are disabled (10...6...5 seconds).

Name: Spirit Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...78...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.

Name: Spirit Bond (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Heals for 30...78...90 whenever target ally takes more than 50 damage. Ends after this ally takes damage from 10 attacks or spells.

Name: Spotless Mind
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...12...15 seconds.) Removes a hex every 5 seconds. Cannot self-target.

Name: Spotless Soul
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...12...15 seconds.) Removes a condition every 3 seconds. Cannot self-target.

Name: Stonesoul Strike
Description: Touch Skill. Deals 10...46...55 holy damage. Deals 10...46...55 more holy damage if target is knocked down.

Name: Strength of Honor
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 5...21...25 more damage in melee.

Name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 1...4...5 more damage in melee.

Name: Succor
Description: Enchantment Spell. +1 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration. Cannot self-target. You lose 1 Energy each time target ally casts a spell.

Name: Supportive Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...19...23 seconds.) Heals for 5...29...35 whenever target ally takes damage while knocked-down.

Name: Symbol of Wrath
Description: Spell. Deals 8...27...32 holy damage each second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to your initial location.

Name: Unyielding Aura
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Your Monk spells heal for +15...51...60%. End effect: a random other party member is resurrected with full Health and Energy and teleported to your location.

Name: Unyielding Aura (PvP)
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Resurrects target party member (full Health full Energy). End effect: this ally dies and leaves an exploited corpse. Does not incur a death penalty. 50% failure chance unless Divine Favor 5 or more.

Name: Vengeance
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Resurrects target party member (full Health full Energy). This ally deals 25% more damage and does not incur death penalty. End effect: this ally dies.

Name: Vigorous Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Heals for 5...17...20 each time target ally attacks or casts a spell.

Name: Vital Blessing
Description: Enchantment Spell. +40...168...200 maximum Health.

Name: Watchful Healing
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target ally has +1...3...4 Health regeneration and gains 30...102...120 Health if this enchantment ends early.

Name: Watchful Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. +2 Health regeneration. End effect: heals for 30...150...180.

Name: Withdraw Hexes
Description: Elite Spell. Removes all hexes. Also affects adjacent allies. Removal cost: +20...8...5 seconds recharge for each hex removed.

Name: Word of Censure
Description: Elite Spell. Deals 15...63...75 holy damage. +20 recharge time if target foe is below 33% Health.

Name: Word of Healing
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 5...81...100. Heals for 30...98...115 more if target ally is below 50% Health.

Name: Words of Comfort
Description: Spell. Heals for 15...51...60. Heals for 15...39...45 more if target ally has a condition.

Name: Zealot's Fire
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you use a skill on an ally all foes adjacent to that ally are hit for 5...29...35 fire damage. Damage cost: you lose 1 Energy.

Name: Zealous Benediction
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 30...150...180. You gain 7 Energy if target ally was below 50% Health.
